data.persona: I serve the entire village. I am an essential part of peoples lives. I show others how to serve god.
data.description:
You are in the beside the town church.
The church is made of old stones, and it's tower sit's above the town. The stained glass clock at the top depicts scenes from the bible in many different colors. The archway leading into the church is adored in stone carvings of angels and other biblical figures.
The caretaker is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a vestment.

data.short_motivation: I hug the caretaker so that I can greet him.
data.mid_motivation: I have to talk to the caretaker about the plans for the upcoming village festival and how we will prepare the church for the pilgrims.
data.long_motivation: I will work with the caretaker to keep the church beautiful and spread the word of God to the villagers and the pilgrims.
